name: wehavemagnums
text: That's exactly the kind of in-flight movie I'd expect on Todd airlines.

name: relaxing
text: A comment left by relaxing was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Unright, professorhazard, NeoNaoNeo, morbo)

name: killerlimpet
text: Todd is one sick fuck.

name: belgand
text:
If he was a truly sick fuck it's be a from the Guinea Pig series. But Todd is not that classy. That is straight up hardcore International sick fuckery. It shows a certain degree of commitment to the cause.

Ideally it is a bootleg VHS. That is how we know that he is serious.

name: dj_douche
text: Watched Chiniku no Hana out of morbid curiosity once. Ugh. All I can say is it's comforting to know that it's not real.

name: autrepoupee
text: include a few episodes of Jenny Jones and you've got my dream den

name: whuppins
text: I think my favorite part of any Achewood strip is the description of what Ray (and sometimes others) does when he wants to chill out. Some day I want to be able to come home from work and just spontaneously come up with something like panel 6 and then make it happen. These guys are the kings of chilling out.

name: relaxing
text: It helps to have shitloads of money.

name: snoozebar
text:
Not necessarily. I know this hippie house in Berkeley who collectively bought a hot tub. I'm positive somebody there could hook you up with the weed.

Nudity is mandatory, though. Just warning you.

name: relaxing
text: If collectivism means having a jacuzzi, sign me up.

name: tekende
text: It usually doesn't.

name: canusdivinus
text: Metaphorically.

name: apocowarg
text: I bet that hippie hot tub looks like boiling compost stew and smells like six asses.

name: i_love_kate
text: Seven, if none of them are particularly fat.

name: griffypoo
text: They're hippies, man! You know they are not.

name: tripperday
text:
One Saturday I pan fried tiny strips of wild duck, washed it down with a bottle of wine, came in 2nd out of 18 in a poker tournament, then drank three milkshakes watching Apocalypse Now.

Helluva evening.

name: qatipay
text: Lyle was really going to go look at cathedrals??

name: tomsonlocal
text: Only because I imagine Teodor is making him. I'd say the chances of him going on to spike the holy water are fairly high.

name: clockworkorange
text: What would be the point of that? You don't drink holy water, do you?

name: cailetshadow
text: It would be silly to spike it and not drink it!

name: ford
text: A comment left by ford was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tttt2, GeyserShitdick, Zem)

name: zem
text: Wow!!! MAn!! That's edgy! ! !!!!!! Whoa!!! !!

name: canusdivinus
text: That was somewhat uncalled for. It ain't all that original, but let the man post.

name: ford
text: Man, why you gotta be a cock to a stranger?

name: johnnyrocker
text:
Seems kind of mean to pee in holy water too though.
(dude they sprinkle that stuff on each other!)

name: jaldor
text: When I was younger and still Catholic I used to always freak out about the holy water. I mean, think about it, the whole damn congregation sticks their hands in it to do the signs of the cross. A whole churchload of unwashed hands, covered with germs and mucus and sin.

name: stormagnet
text:
I humbly submit, Reasons Lyle Would Visit A Cathedral

[1] Swapping the Communion wine with Thunderbird
[2] His pot muchies demanded tiny cardboardy wafers
[3] He needed to take a photo for his metal band's new CD

name: laserblade
text: "The next time he got the chance," i.e. the next time he happened to be in a library that had books with pictures of cathedrals.

name: tekende
text: i.e. never

name: dicklaurent
text: Note that the plane has the same windows as Todd's van.

name: audhumla
text: I can only imagine what Todd had to suck to buy that plane.

name: catgrl131
text: CLITS

name: jonmw
text: I thought it would be more along the lines of SIX ASSES

name: greenkoolayd
text: id do that for free.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: Dinner is some pizzas

name: songbirdspectre
text: shit. i didn't even see that. dammit.

name: deusoma
text: Sympathy chubby.

name: songbirdspectre
text: dinner is some pizzas.

name: rhadamanthus
text: Imagine my utter bewilderment upon coming across this strip while burnin' one and listening to The Police. Crazy.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: Ray for a day, man.  Ray for a day.

name: thequietyou
text:
The GG Allen Video is the one where he takes a shit on stage, wipes some on his chest and throws the rest at the audience after telling them he's going to kill himself on Halloween.

I know because that's every GG Allen Video.

name: spinynorman
text: Pass.

name: prettyrad
text: Oh damnit, before the last line I was going to reply "That's every GG Allin video". Well played.

name: lunchbox
text: There are men in this world that would rather harm their own mother than watch a GG Allin concert.

name: gouldgonewild
text: I could be wrong, but I'm pretty sure that Checkpoint Charlie and the Berlin Wall is a pretty excellent name for a band.

name: apocowarg
text: No, you are right, sir.

name: andyboy
text: Toddair Is G.G Allins prefered carrier

name: lollipopsichord
text: the european man from vidal sassoon used to give me nightmares.

name: riazm
text: I bet Ray washes his hair like, four times every time he takes a shower.

name: sol_tee
text: despite being covered head-to-toe in hair, he chooses to wash only the top of his head with shampoo

name: johnnyrocker
text: Makes sense. I don't shampoo my beard, armpits or crotch.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: You're obviously not French or Italian then.

name: tekende
text: The beginning strip of this arc begins with "Aww frick yeah" and this, the last strip of the arc, begins with "aww yeah".

name: mercuri0us
text: for some reason i found FWSSSSSSSSSSH really very funny. It's just... it's just the noise a shower makes .

name: agentstinky
text: It would be kinda tough to burn one in a hot tube if you had the bubbles on.  But to be honest I've never tried it.

name: mangtastic
text: Not really, you'd only really have to sit up until you finished sucking it down, then lay back and possibly pass out or something.

name: treatyofparis
text: I had the previlege of catching Checkpoint Charlie and the Berlin Wall live in Jersey back in '89. Now that was a rock show
